name: Escape from the Dungeon
description:
You wake up alone in an old mysterious dungeon. You need to find your way to escape. The dungeon seems derelict but there is also something else...

CONTROLS:

W, S, A, D: Move
LEFT SHIFT: Run
LEFT CTRL: Crouch
SPACE BAR: Jump
MOUSE: Look
LEFT MOUSE: Interact
ESC: Pause

Feel free to report bugs, to give feedback and to ask about the technical details.
